document_data.mainbody:
Lord Gilbert Irlentree was a patriar of Baldurs Gate sometime in or before the late 15 century DR.
Gilbert Irlentrees likeness was immortalized in a series of portraits. He was depicted as a middle-aged human man with fair skin, dark eyes, graying beard and a large important-looking hat. He was adorned in dark finery and wore a large ruffled collar.
In the , a portrait of Gilbert Irlentree was kept in the attic of the Jannath estate of Baldurs Gate. That year, it became possessed by wailing poltergeists and tortured spirits.
